projects.title: Banan Bakery
projects.description: Developed an e-commerce website for a bakery using Laravel framework. Implemented features such as product management, categories, discounts, orders and pre-orders, and shipping costs.

projects.title: Ninilos

resumeJson.about: Experienced PHP Developer specializing in Laravel framework with a focus on backend development and database management. Proven track record in e-commerce solutions, encompassing product and category management, discounts, orders, pre-orders, and shipping costs. Skilled in mentoring junior developers and thrive in collaborative team environments.

experiences.title: Full Stack Developer at Shahrara.net (2015 - Present) - onsite
experiences.description: Shahrara Company is an active company in creating smart and creative solutions in the digital world.
responsibilities: Developed and maintained e-commerce websites using Laravel framework
Created and managed databases using MySQL
Collaborated with front-end developers to ensure seamless integration between front-end and back-end systems
Implemented features such as product management, categories, discounts, orders and pre-orders, and shipping costs

workExperience.description: Shahrara Company is an active company in creating smart and creative solutions in the digital world.
responsibilities: PHP mid-level developer (2015-2017): I joined Shahrara Company as a Mid-Level PHP Developer and, right from the start, focused on enhancing my skills through engaging in new and creative positions alongside various projects.

PHP Senior developer (2017-2021): After advancing my skills, I transitioned to a Senior Developer role, leading the programming team. Alongside, I actively contributed to generating creative solutions for problem-solving.

Team leader (2021-Present): As a team leader, I excel in project planning, task delegation, and performance assessment. With a decade's experience, I lead teams in adhering to development standards, ensuring code quality, and fostering technical and teamwork skills. I am dedicated to enhancing team coordination, improving project productivity, and facilitating software development processes for optimal results.

resumeJson.otherProjects: Other digital solutions for well-known brands: Worked on various projects for well-known brands, including Razeghi (https://webapp.razeghigroup.com/) is an app for ordering food from the Razeghi restaurant, Narenj (https://webapp.narenj.me/) is an app designed as a marketplace for stores to showcase their products, and Dryvity (https://dryvity.ir/) is a website for purchasing products such as pistachios, dried fruits, and more. Developed backend solutions using Laravel framework.
